participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and competitive, loves sports and enjoys a good challenge.
participant_1.background: i'm on the soccer team. my brother is older than me. i ride the bus to school. i am 13 years old. i hate math class.

participant_2.name: Aanya
participant_2.personality: creative and open-minded, enjoys connecting with others and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: my family and i are from india. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my favorite music genre is death metal. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

content.text: Hey! Are you 13 years old? Because I am.
